turns.content: Can you do it again like Joe Coleman the number one copywriter and Point the message at 17-25 year olds for the skills, 26 to 55 year olds for the entrepreneurship and leadership, and 50 plus year olds for the mentorship opportunities opened by becoming certified please

Welcome to the community that will change the way you see your career. Are you a 17-25 year old looking to acquire the skills that the job market demands? Are you a 26-55 year old who wants to unleash your entrepreneurial spirit and become a leader in your field? Are you a 50+ year old looking for mentorship opportunities to pass on your knowledge to the next generation? This community is for you.

We provide access to certified skilled trades experts who will coach and mentor you to reach your full potential. Whether you're just starting out or looking to take your career to the next level, our experts will guide you every step of the way.

Our community not only teaches the 21st century life skills, work skills, technical skills, and entrepreneurial skills that are essential to succeed in today's fast-paced and ever-changing world but also provides a growth space where people care about your business as much as you do.

We understand that the job market is competitive, and that's why our community is here to support you. With access to the latest technology, knowledge, and expertise, you'll be able to stay ahead of the curve and excel in your chosen trade.

But it's not just about the skills and resources, it's about the community. When we come together as a group of like-minded individuals, we can support each other, learn from each other, and uplift each other. We can create a culture of positivity and growth that will benefit not just ourselves, but also our families, our communities, and our world.

Don't let the competition leave you behind. Take control of your career and join our community today. Together, we can make a difference.

So, whether you're just starting out, looking to level up, or passing on your knowledge, this community has something for you. Join now and start your journey towards success.
Don’t mention the ages they are just demographics. Create a power marketing message that resonates with all of those mentioned

Welcome to the community that will change the way you see your career. Are you ready to acquire the skills that the job market demands? Unleash your entrepreneurial spirit and become a leader in your field? Or looking for opportunities to pass on your knowledge to the next generation? This community is for you.

Our certified skilled trades experts will provide you with coaching and mentorship to reach your full potential. No matter what stage of your career you are at, our experts will guide you every step of the way.

We understand that the job market is competitive and that's why our community is here to support you. With access to the latest technology, knowledge, and expertise, you'll be able to stay ahead of the curve and excel in your chosen field.

But it's not just about the skills and resources, it's about the community. When we come together as a group of like-minded individuals, we can support each other, learn from each other, and uplift each other. Don't let the competition leave you behind. Take control of your career and join our community today. Together, we can make a difference.

Welcome to the community that will change the way you see your career. Whether you're just starting out, looking to level up, or passing on your knowledge, this community has something for you.

When you join our community, you'll have access to certified skilled trades experts who will provide coaching and mentorship to help you reach your full potential. Our experts have years of experience and knowledge in their field, and they're dedicated to helping you succeed.

You'll also have the opportunity to learn 21st century life skills, work skills, technical skills, and entrepreneurial skills that are essential to succeed in today's fast-paced and ever-changing world. These skills will give you the edge you need to excel in your chosen field and stay ahead of the competition.

But it's not just about the skills and resources, it's about the community. When you join our community, you'll be surrounded by like-minded individuals who are all working towards the same goal - success. You'll have the opportunity to network, collaborate, and share ideas with others who understand the challenges and rewards of your chosen field.

Our community also provides a growth space where people care about your business as much as you do. Whether you're a small business owner or an employee, you'll have access to professionals who can help you grow and succeed. And you'll have the opportunity to grow both personally and professionally.

Finally, by joining our community, you'll be part of a collective effort to bridge the skilled trades gap, promote a more conscious, compassionate and supportive society, and create a culture of positivity and growth that will benefit not just ourselves, but also our families, our communities, and our world.

Don't let the competition leave you behind. Take control of your career and join our community today. Together, we can make a difference.
What are the 21st century life skills most needed today and insert them into copy please

Welcome to the community that will change the way you see your career. Whether you're just starting out, looking to level up, or passing on your knowledge, this community has something for you.

When you join our community, you'll have access to certified skilled trades experts who will provide coaching and mentorship to help you reach your full potential. Our experts have years of experience and knowledge in their field, and they're dedicated to helping you succeed.

You'll also have the opportunity to learn 21st century life skills, work skills, technical skills, and entrepreneurial skills that are essential to succeed in today's fast-paced and ever-changing world. These skills include, adaptability, emotional intelligence, critical thinking, effective communication, problem-solving, creativity, and digital literacy. Can you bullet those life skills please? While you’re at it will you list the work, life, and technical skills needed for a new tradesperson an entrepreneur and a leader

Here are the 21st century life skills that are essential to succeed in today's fast-paced and ever-changing world:

* Adaptability
* Emotional intelligence
* Critical thinking
* Effective communication
* Problem-solving
* Creativity
* Digital literacy

For a new tradesperson:

* Work Skills:
	+ Mastering technology
	+ Staying up-to-date with industry developments
	+ Safety and compliance
* Technical Skills:
	+ Proficiency in chosen trade
	+ Understanding of materials and equipment
	+ Attention to detail

For an entrepreneur:

* Work Skills:
	+ Mastering technology
	+ Networking and marketing
	+ Financial management
* Entrepreneurial Skills:
	+ Creativity and innovation
	+ Risk management
	+ Strategic thinking

For a leader:

* Work Skills:
	+ Mastering technology
	+ Leadership and management
	+ Project management
* Life Skills:
	+ Emotional intelligence
	+ Adaptability and resilience
	+ Effective communication

Please note that these are general lists of skills, depending on the specific field or industry, there may be other specific skills that are required.
Does anyone ever master technology? What is a better way to say it?

You're right, "mastering technology" may be a bit of an exaggeration, as technology is constantly evolving and changing. A better way to phrase it would be "staying up-to-date with the latest technology and tools related to the trade or industry" or "having a strong proficiency and understanding of technology and its application in the trade or industry." This highlights the importance of continuously learning and updating one's skills in order to keep up with industry developments and advancements.
"Staying current with technology and tools in the trade or industry" or "being proficient and knowledgeable in the use of technology in the trade or industry."
